channel.title: About on Caleb Fultz
channel.description: Recent content in About on Caleb Fultz

item.description: About Caleb I am a highly experienced Linux System Administrator with over 20 years of experience working in Linux computing environments. Currently, I work as a Tier Three Linux System Administrator at the National Radio Astronomy Observatory (NRAO), where I (attempt to) improve products and services for scientists and the scientific community by utilizing high-throughput computing clusters attached to multi-petabyte Lustre network storage clusters. As a father to a little boy on the autism spectrum, I’ve learned that life is full of unexpected twists and turns.
